content: Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 30 Apr 2019How to begin investing in the S&P 500? It sounds simple, but there are lots of tricky details like withholding tax, brokerage fees esp for SG, etc 1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 01 May 2019You need a brokerage account, with access to US markets. You will need to fill in a W8Ben Form, the brokerage will guide you.Any US stock dividends are taxed at 30%. What you receive is after tax.Brokerage fees, check with broker platform. There are minimum brokerage fees from as low as $10 to $25. So, as a starter, set everything, open the acccounts, familiarize with the online platforms.0 comments0
